body_content.explanation: an object that goes on top of something in order to decorate it:
examples: An illuminated star topper is a great way of finishing off your Christmas tree.
Their wedding cake topper was a cute sculpture of the couple.
We sell a range of stick-on card toppers.

body_content.explanation: a type of food that is put on top of another food:
examples: Tofu makes a great salad topper.
The spread is perfect as a sandwich filler or toast topper.

body_content.explanation: a thick cover that goes on top of a mattress (= the soft part of a bed that you lie on) in order to make it more comfortable:
examples: You can add this memory foam topper to help minimize aches and pains.

body_content.explanation: the person, group, organization, etc. in the highest position on a list:
examples: The Spice Girls were chart toppers in the 90s.
The team now sit just one point below the table toppers.

body_content.explanation: the last in a series of good or bad events, remarks, actions, etc., especially when this is even better or worse than everything that has gone before:
examples: Going to his concert was definitely the topper of our trip to Nashville.
The topper was when a physician told me I'd just have to live with the pain.
The next day, his wife filed for divorce. This is the topper on the mayor's string of recent difficulties.

body_content.explanation: the best student in a class or school

examples: A whole new take on a classic denim jacket, this crisp white topper features vibrant floral embroidery and lace details.
They were wearing grey toppers and standard wedding gear.
